DefaultValues.desc: Stat values that are always set equal to their respective growth values and then modified upon creation:

Class.name: UNIVERSAL VALUES
Class.baseStatModifiers: Reflexes,=:0/Dodge,*:4.0/Accuracy,=:100/Pierce Res.,*:3.0/Slash Res.,*:3.0/Crush Res.,*:3.0/Mental Res.,*:3.0/Heat Res.,*:3.0/Cold Res.,*:3.0/Light Res.,*:3.0/Shadow Res.,*:3.0/Recovery Rate,+:20/Appetite,=:2/Leadership,=:6
Class.desc: These modifications are applied upon character creation, and then never used again; not even if someone changes classes.

Class.name: Assassin
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Knife Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Mega Stab,Knife Counterattack,Dodge Proficiency/Reflexes Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A mobile fighter with high dodge and huge backstab bonuses.
Class.desc: Though unarmored and relatively weak, assassins have tons of Speed and Dodge, and get a huge backstab bonus that makes investing in better weapons pay off immensely. Best at slaying frail, hard-to-reach targets.

Class.name: Axefighter
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Axe Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Axe Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Small Shield Mastery,Armor Rend/Shove 2,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Pull 2,Whirlwind,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A front-line fighter with big damage output but weak defenses.
Class.desc: Axefighters are strong but lightly armored melee brawlers with the ability to equip throwing axes, rend armor, and—eventually—hit all enemies in a 360-degree arc around them.

Class.name: Barudit
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mace Mastery,Mace Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Stunner,Flail Mastery,Nimble Stance/Defiant Stance,Pull 2/Shove 2,Quick Shove,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency/Dodge Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: An unarmored front-line fighter with good dodge and numerous status effect attacks.
Class.desc: A barudit is a fleet-footed user of the barud, a traditional lissit crushing weapon. Barudit are effective against armored targets, and can use their barudesh to stun, weaken, or immobilize enemies.

Class.name: Bowman
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Bow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Bow Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Split Shot 2/Quick Shot,Trueshaft,Strength Proficiency/Accuracy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: The bowman can strike enemies from farther away than any other base class.
Class.desc: Bowmen are ranged fighters that can fire an arrow and keep moving. They learn to use long bows, can learn to split shots between multiple arrows, and can learn to arc their shots for massive range.

Class.name: Bronze Golem
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Spin Saw,Module Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Rending Arc,Self Repair,Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A slow, powerful front-line fighter that can attack multiple enemies at once.
Class.desc: Bronze Golems are slow-moving tanks. They have the most Health of any base class by far, and can rip through multiple enemies at a time with their terrifying spinsaw-mounted chain arms.

Class.name: Cavalier
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Lance Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery/Lance Counterattack,Halberd Mastery,Great Shield Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A highly mobile front-line fighter that can move, attack, and move again.
Class.desc: Mounted heavy-armored units, cavaliers have high Speed. They can close distance, strike with their lances, and retreat in a single turn. Cavaliers typically learn Charge, which stuns and knocks back enemies.

Class.name: Crossbowman
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Crossbow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Poison Bolt,Piercing Bolt,Grape Shot,Bayonet Counterattack,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A heavy-hitting ranged class; tougher than bowmen, but less mobile.
Class.desc: Medium-armored units with a medium-range shot and a bayonet attack. They typically learn Powder Bolt, which is very effective at destroying doors, barricades, and bridges, and can easily detonate the Engineer's satchel charge.

Class.name: Cryokineticist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Orb Mastery,Frost Armor,Douse,Create Ice,ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Cryo Cross/Frost Army,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can freeze enemies solid and create ice bridges in water.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in Cold skills. Cryokineticists learn skills that can freeze enemies solid and create ice bridges on open water; they may also learn Frost Armor, which hardens an ally against physical attacks.

Class.name: Dark Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Claw,Dark Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can immobilize and soften multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A spriggat possessing Shadow affinity. Highly resistant to Shadow skills, dark spriggats typically learn Dark Breath, which can soften and immobilize multiple enemies in a row.

Class.name: Engineer
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Tool Mastery,Build Wood Barricade,Build Wood Bridge,Place Caltrops
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Light Armor Mastery,Place Charges,Place Brazier,Build Spiked Barricade
Class.skillProgressionLate: Build Stone Bridge,Build Wood Bridge 2,Build Wood Barricade 2,Build Stone Barricade/Place Timed Charges,ModSkillRange;;Place Caltrops;;+:1 Tag/Place Snare Trap/Wrench Counterattack,Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A support unit who can place bridges, barricades, and traps right on the battlefield.
Class.desc: Though relatively weak combatants on their own, engineers specialize in placing bridges, barricades, and traps onto the battlefield in order to open up and close off avenues of attack for their allies.

Class.name: Frost Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Claw,Frost Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Douse
Class.skillProgressionLate: Frost Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can freeze multiple enemies solid in a row.
Class.desc: A spriggat possessing Cold affinity. Highly resistant to Cold skills, frost spriggats typically learn Frost Breath, which can hit multiple enemies in a row and freeze them solid.

Class.name: Gasul
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mace Mastery,Mace Counterattack,Mind Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Long Shield/Big Shield,Stunner,Orb Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: Unarmored front-line fighters with the ability to heal allies.
Class.desc: Lissit shamans, gasul are somewhat less skilled with the barud than are barudit; however, they make up for this through their access to psy abilities, most commonly a selection of psychokinetic shields.

Class.name: Golden Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Claw,Light Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Stimulate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can blind multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A spriggat possessing Light affinity. Highly resistant to Light skills, golden spriggats typically learn Light Breath, which can hit multiple enemies in a row and blind them.

Class.name: Kineticist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Kinetic Gust,Kinetic Pull
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Kinetic Wind,Gravity Spike,Kinetic Constriction,ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,ForSpecies:Human:Levitate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Orb Mastery,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Kinetic Gale,Kinetic Vacuum,Gravity Well/Kinetic Wave,Mind Blast Counterattack/Levitate Other,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can fling enemies around and reposition allies remotely.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in manipulating the position of friends and enemies at a distance; dangerous around environmental hazards, and they can learn to crash flying enemies into the ground.

Class.name: Mentalist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Mind Shock,Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Vengeance,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can learn to stun, manipulate, even control enemies.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in Mental skills. Good for dispatching assassins, since Mental attacks always hit. Typically learns to stun at a distance with Mind Shock, and to gain control of enemies through Mind Control.

Class.name: Photokineticist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Light Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Bomb,Mind Blast Counterattack,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can blind enemies and easily crack stone.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in Light skills. Photokineticists learn skills that can blind enemies; they may also learn Blinding Cloak, which grants an ally a huge Dodge chance.

Class.name: Psy Healer
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Shield,Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,Mega Shield,Long Shield/Far Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Big Shield,Orb Mastery,Solid State Shield,Static Shield,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who specializes in healing allies.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in a variety of Shield skills. Adept at keeping wounded units alive, they eventually learn to boost health past maximum with Static Shield, and to block spaces with Solid State Shield.

Class.name: Pyrokineticist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Pyro Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Create Fire,Fire Gate/Overheat,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can set enemies on fire and easily detonate explosives.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in Heat skills. Pyrokineticists learn skills that can set enemies ablaze; they also typically learn Defrost, which frees frozen allies.

Class.name: Red Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Claw,Fire Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Defrost
Class.skillProgressionLate: Fire Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can set multiple enemies on fire in a row.
Class.desc: A spriggat possessing Heat affinity. Highly resistant to Heat skills, red spriggats typically learn Fire Breath, which can hit multiple enemies in a row and set them ablaze.

Class.name: Skiakineticist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast,Shadow Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Vortex/Miasma,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can immobilize enemies and weaken their physical defenses.
Class.desc: A psy user specializing in Shadow skills. Skiakineticists learn skills that can soften and immobilize enemies; they may also learn Fury, which massively boosts an ally's Strength.

Class.name: Spearman
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Spear Mastery,Spear Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Shove
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Stick-and-Drag 2,Impale,Pierce Res. Proficiency/Slash Res. Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A heavily armored front-line fighter that can attack from up to 2 spaces away.
Class.desc: Spearmen are the tankiest human units. They can strike from a slight distance to avoid melee counterattacks, and typically learn to equip javelins, heavy armor, and great shields.

Class.name: Spirit
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Soul Suck,Transfer,Mind Shield/Mind Shock/Gravity Spike/Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Drain,Possess/Juxtapose,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.baseStatModifiers: Health,+:15/Energy,*:5.0,f:12/Strength,=:0/Psy,+:5/Perception,=:4/Speed,f:4/Appetite,=:0/Morale,=:0/Leadership,=:0/Pierce Res.,+:70/Slash Res.,+:50/Crush Res.,+:90/Mental Res.,-:50/Poison Res.,=:100/Recovery Rate,=:100
Class.shortDesc: A being with incredible physical defense but high vulnerability to mental attacks. Cannot die.
Class.desc: Almost completely impervious to physical attacks, Spirits have huge stores of Energy. They can learn to transfer Energy to allies, drain Energy from enemies, or even possess or swap positions with the bodies of their foes.

Class.name: Stone Golem
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Fist,Shove,ModSkillCost;;Shove 2;;-:3 Tag,Toss,Module Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Engine Boost,Smash,Backthrow/Hurl,Shove 2,Fist Counterattack,Slash Res. Proficiency/Pierce Res. Proficiency/Crush Res. Proficiency
Class.growthModifiers: Strength,+:2/Pierce Res.,+:3/Slash Res.,+:2/Crush Res.,+:1/Cold Res.,=:0/Light Res.,=:0
Class.baseStatModifiers: Health,+:15,*:2.0/Energy,*:2.5,f:2/Strength,+:7/Perception,=:4/Speed,f:3/Dodge,-:10/Appetite,=:0/Morale,=:0/Leadership,=:0/Pierce Res.,*:6.0/Slash Res.,*:6.0/Crush Res.,*:6.0/Cold Res.,-:25/Light Res.,-:25/Poison Res.,=:100
Class.shortDesc: A slow, heavily armored front-line fighter that can hurl enemies great distances.
Class.desc: Stone Golems are slow-moving tanks. They are highly resistant to physical attacks, and can use their powerful arms to grab and throw foes significant distances into one another, off cliffs, or into water or lava.

Class.name: Swordsman
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Sword Mastery,Sword Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Main Gauche Mastery,Shove
Class.skillProgressionLate: Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance,Rapier Mastery,Lunge/Cut,Shove 2/Pull 2,Double Strike,Energy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A balanced, versatile front-line skirmisher with solid offenses and defenses.
Class.desc: Medium-armored units who learn to neutralize enemy counterattacks through Feint and deal heavy damage with Double Strike, swordsmen are specialized for one-on-one melee scrapping.

Class.name: Blackguard
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Throwing Knife Mastery,Knife Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Mega Stab,Knife Counterattack,Dodge Proficiency/Reflexes Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A mobile fighter with high dodge and huge backstab bonuses.
Class.desc: Blackguards are stronger than regular assassins, easily taking out weak characters behind the front lines. Blackguards gain Throwing Knife Mastery, allowing them to attack from outside melee range before closing in for the kill.

Class.name: Whisper
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Hide,Knife Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Mega Stab,Knife Counterattack,Dodge Proficiency/Reflexes Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A mobile fighter with high dodge and huge backstab bonuses.
Class.desc: Whispers are even more mobile and agile than regular assassins, easily taking out weak characters behind the front lines. Whispers gain Hide, allowing them to completely evade detection behind enemy lines.

Class.name: Berserker
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Axe Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Axe Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Berserk,Small Shield Mastery,Armor Rend/Shove 2,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Pull 2,Whirlwind,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A front-line fighter with big damage output but weak defenses.
Class.desc: Berserkers are stronger than regular axefighters, with a lot of extra energy and a bonus counterattack. Learns Berserk, which boosts their movement and strength for one turn.

Class.name: Marauder
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Medium Armor Mastery,Axe Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Axe Counterattack,ModAfterAttack;;Grappler Stance;;Can Attack Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Small Shield Mastery,Armor Rend/Shove 2,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Pull 2,Whirlwind,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A front-line fighter with big damage output but weak defenses.
Class.desc: Marauders are tougher than regular axefighters, with medium armor mastery to improve their survivability on the front lines. They can also follow up Grappler Stance with other attacks.

Class.name: Drake
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Light Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Mace Mastery,Net Mastery,Grandmace Mastery,Mace Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Stunner,Nimble Stance/Defiant Stance,Flail Mastery,Pull 2/Shove 2,Quick Shove,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency/Dodge Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A lightly armored front-line fighter with good dodge and numerous status effect attacks.
Class.desc: A more powerful barudit, the Drake has boosted stats across the board, with small shield and light armor masteries for a more reliable melee defense.

Class.name: Wyrm
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Mace Mastery,Net Mastery,Grandmace Mastery,Mace Counterattack,ModSkillRange;;Throw Net;;+:1 Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Stunner,Nimble Stance/Defiant Stance,Flail Mastery,Pull 2/Shove 2,Quick Shove,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency/Dodge Proficiency,Grappler Stance
Class.shortDesc: An unarmored front-line fighter with good dodge and numerous status effect attacks.
Class.desc: A more powerful barudit, the Wyrm focuses on offense with increased strength and a bonus counterattack to dole out pain to enemies. Learns Grappler Stance; +1 range to Throw Net.

Class.name: Bowmaster
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Bow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Bow Counterattack
Class.skillProgressionLate: Longbow Mastery,Split Shot 2/Quick Shot,Trueshaft,Strength Proficiency/Accuracy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: The bowmaster can strike enemies from far away, then retreat out of range.
Class.desc: Bowmasters are fast-moving, accurate bowmen that can fire an arrow and keep moving. Specialized for harrying the enemy, they are most effective at range.

Class.name: Sniper
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Bow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Bow Counterattack,RangeBonus;;Bow;;+:1 Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Longbow Mastery,Split Shot 2/Quick Shot,Trueshaft,Strength Proficiency/Accuracy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: The sniper can strike enemies from very far away with great accuracy.
Class.desc: Snipers are accurate bowmen with +1 range on their bow attacks. They excel at long-range attacks using Arced Shot and Longbow to reach behind the front lines.

Class.name: Titan
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Spin Saw,Module Mastery,ModSkillCost;;Hold;;-:4 Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Rending Arc,Self Repair,Spin Saw Counterattack,Spin Saw 2 Counterattack,Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A slow, powerful front-line fighter that can attack multiple enemies at once.
Class.desc: Titans are tanks with incredible staying power and flexible countrattacking capability. With the most Health of any class by far, they can rip through multiple enemies at a time counterattacking with either Spin Saw or Spin Saw 2, as needed. Hold costs 4 less Energy.

Class.name: Colossus
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Spin Saw,Module Mastery,ModSkillCost;;Engine Boost;;-:2 Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Rending Arc,Self Repair,Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A slow, powerful front-line fighter that can attack multiple enemies at once.
Class.desc: Colossi are tanks with incredible offensive power and greater ability to gain bursts of speed. They have optimized attacks with their terrifying spinsaw-mounted chain arms, dealing greater damage and counterattacking with Spin Saw 2 in a pinch. Engine Boost costs 2 less Energy.

Class.name: Mant Lancer
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Lance Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery/Lance Counterattack,Halberd Mastery,Great Shield Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency,Mega Charge
Class.shortDesc: A highly mobile front-line fighter that can move, attack, and move again.
Class.desc: The Mant Lancer is a more offensively powerful cavalier, with greater strength, extra movement, multiple counterattacks, and a substantial boost to energy for Charge attacks. Place them in melee range to bait out enemies and punish them with retaliatory blows.

Class.name: Mantis Knight
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Lance Mastery,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,ModAfterAttack;;Lance;;Use Once Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Halberd;;Use Once Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery,Lance Counterattack,Halberd Mastery,Great Shield Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency,Mega Charge
Class.shortDesc: A highly mobile front-line fighter that can move, attack, and move again.
Class.desc: The Mantis Knight is a force to be reckoned with, featuring boosted reflexes and physical resistances, plus the ability to follow up with other skills after striking with Lance or Halberd.

Class.name: Arbalist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Powder Bolt;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Powder Bolt;;-:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Grape Shot;;-:2 Tag,ModSkillRange;;Grape Shot;;+:1 Tag,Crossbow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Poison Bolt,Piercing Bolt,Grape Shot,Bayonet Counterattack,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A heavy-hitting ranged class; tougher than bowmen, but less mobile.
Class.desc: Arbalists are crossbowmen who've specialized in explosive attacks that bypass armor and effectively destroy doors, barricades, and bridges, and can easily detonate the Engineer's satchel charge. They use these abilities for less energy and at greater range.

Class.name: Sharpshooter
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Crossbow;;+:1 Tag,Crossbow Mastery,Light Armor Mastery
Class.skillProgressionLate: Poison Bolt,Piercing Bolt,Grape Shot,Bayonet Counterattack,Strength Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A heavy-hitting ranged class; tougher than bowmen, but less mobile.
Class.desc: Sharpshooters are crossbowmen with boosted crossbow range and greater strength. They are also significantly more accurate, lending the Poison Bolt skill greater reliability in inflicting Poisoned status.

Class.name: Cryarch
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillPower;;Cryo Blast;;+:5 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Cryo Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Cryo Cross/Frost Army,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can freeze enemies solid and create ice bridges in water.
Class.desc: A cryokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Cryo Blast, dealing 5 extra damage with each use and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Cryokurios
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Cryo Blast;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Cryo Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Cryo Cross/Frost Army,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can freeze enemies solid and create ice bridges in water.
Class.desc: A cryokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Cryo Blast, freezing enemies solid with greater range and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Greater Dark Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Dark Breath;;-:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Dark Breath 2;;-:1 Tag,Claw,Dark Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Dark Breath 3
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can immobilize and soften multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A dark spriggat specializing in breath attacks that can soften and immobilize multiple enemies in a row.

Class.name: Shadowclaw
Class.skillProgressionInitial: BonusDmg;;Claw;;5;;Shadow Tag,Claw,Dark Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Claws
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can immobilize and soften multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A dark spriggat specializing in melee. Sporting boosted Health and Dodge to better survive melee combat, the Shadowclaw also imbues each claw strike with Shadow damage to partially bypass regular armor.

Class.name: Architect
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Sprint,Tool Mastery,Build Wood Barricade,Build Wood Bridge,Place Caltrops,ModAfterAttack;;Build Wood Barricade;;Use Once Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Build Spiked Barricade;;Use Once Tag,ModSkillRange;;Build Wood Barricade 2;;+:1 Tag
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Light Armor Mastery,Place Charges,Place Brazier,Build Spiked Barricade
Class.skillProgressionLate: Build Stone Bridge,Build Wood Bridge 2,Build Wood Barricade 2,Build Stone Barricade/Place Timed Charges,ModSkillRange;;Place Caltrops;;+:1 Tag/Wrench Counterattack,Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A support unit who can place bridges, barricades, and traps right on the battlefield.
Class.desc: An engineer specializing in the building of bridges and barricades. Well-practiced at building, they can move with greater speed, take extra actions after building a wood or spiked barricade, get +1 range on Build Wood Barricade 2, and learn Place Caltrops 2.

Class.name: Demolitionist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Place Charges;;+:2 Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Place Charges;;Use Once Tag,ModSkillRange;;Place Timed Charges;;+:1 Tag,Tool Mastery,Place Caltrops,Build Wood Bridge,Build Wood Barricade
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Light Armor Mastery,Place Charges,Place Brazier,Build Spiked Barricade
Class.skillProgressionLate: Build Stone Bridge,Build Wood Bridge 2,Build Wood Barricade 2,Build Stone Barricade/Place Timed Charges,ModSkillRange;;Place Caltrops;;+:1 Tag/Wrench Counterattack,Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A support unit who can place bridges, barricades, and traps right on the battlefield.
Class.desc: An engineer specializing in the placement of explosives, they can safely hurl satchel charges at range, and can take more actions after using Place Charges.

Class.name: Machinist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Tool Mastery,Place Caltrops,Build Wood Bridge,Build Wood Barricade,Tune Up
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Light Armor Mastery,Place Charges,Place Brazier,Build Spiked Barricade
Class.skillProgressionLate: Recharge,Build Stone Bridge,Build Wood Bridge 2,Build Wood Barricade 2,Build Stone Barricade/Place Timed Charges,ModSkillRange;;Place Caltrops;;+:1 Tag/Wrench Counterattack,Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A support unit who can place bridges, barricades, and traps right on the battlefield.
Class.desc: An engineer specializing in the operation and maintenance of golems, they learn skills to support and boost the power of golem allies.

Class.name: Greater Frost Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Frost Breath;;-:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Frost Breath 2;;-:1 Tag,Claw,Frost Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Douse
Class.skillProgressionLate: Frost Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Frost Breath 3
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can freeze multiple enemies solid in a row.
Class.desc: A frost spriggat specializing in breath attacks that can hit multiple enemies in a row and freeze them solid.

Class.name: Frozenclaw
Class.skillProgressionInitial: BonusDmg;;Claw;;5;;Cold Tag,Claw,Frost Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Douse
Class.skillProgressionLate: Frost Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Claws
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can freeze multiple enemies solid in a row.
Class.desc: A frost spriggat specializing in melee. Sporting boosted Health and Dodge to better survive melee combat, the Frozenclaw also imbues each claw strike with Cold damage to partially bypass regular armor.

Class.name: Prophet
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Awareness,Mace Mastery,Mace Counterattack,Mind Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Quick Shove,Long Shield/Big Shield,Stunner,Orb Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: Unarmored front-line fighters with the ability to heal allies.
Class.desc: A gasul who has achieved a form of limited precognition, the prophet possesses an eerie knack for predicting and avoiding enemy attacks in battle. Learns Quick Shove.

Class.name: Protector
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Mind Shield;;%:50 Tag,Static Shield,Mace Mastery,Mace Counterattack,Mind Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Long Shield/Big Shield,Far Shield,Stunner,Orb Mastery,Strength Proficiency/Health Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: Unarmored front-line fighters with the ability to heal allies.
Class.desc: A gasul who has achieved mastery of psychokinetic shields, learning Static Shield and using Mind Shield at 50% the normal energy cost. They learn Far Shield as well.

Class.name: Greater Golden Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Light Breath;;-:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Light Breath 2;;-:1 Tag,Claw,Light Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Stimulate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Light Breath 3
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can blind multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A golden spriggat specializing in breath attacks that can hit multiple enemies in a row and blind them.

Class.name: Brightclaw
Class.skillProgressionInitial: BonusDmg;;Claw;;5;;Light Tag,Claw,Light Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Stimulate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Claws
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can blind multiple enemies in a row.
Class.desc: A golden spriggat specializing in melee. Sporting boosted Health and Dodge to better survive melee combat, the Brightclaw also imbues each claw strike with Light damage to partially bypass regular armor.

Class.name: Kinetokurios
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Kinetic Constriction;;+:2 Tag,ModSkillPower;;Kinetic Constriction;;+:5 Tag,ModSkillSFX;;Kinetic Constriction;;Weakened Tag,Mind Blast,Kinetic Gust,Kinetic Pull
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Kinetic Wind,Gravity Spike,Kinetic Constriction,ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,ForSpecies:Human:Levitate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Orb Mastery,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Kinetic Gale,Kinetic Vacuum,Gravity Well/Kinetic Wave,Levitate Other/Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can fling enemies around and reposition allies remotely.
Class.desc: A kineticist who has achieved true mastery over Kinetic Constriction, psychically crushing enemies with much greater range and power. Kinetic Constriction can now cause Weakened status.

Class.name: Puppetmaster
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Kinetic Gust;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillRange;;Kinetic Pull;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Kinetic Gust;;%:50 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Kinetic Pull;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Kinetic Gust,Kinetic Pull,Kinetic Surge
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Kinetic Wind,Gravity Spike,Kinetic Constriction,Kinetic Gale,Kinetic Vacuum,Kinetic Wave,ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,ForSpecies:Human:Levitate
Class.skillProgressionLate: Orb Mastery,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Gravity Well,Kinetic Surge,Levitate Other/Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can fling enemies around and reposition allies remotely.
Class.desc: A kineticist who has achieved true mastery over kinetic manipulation, learning Kinetic Wave and Kinetic Surge and gaining extra range on Kinetic Gust and Kinetic Pull.

Class.name: Mastermind
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Mind Control;;+:2 Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Mind Control;;Use Once Tag,ModSkillCost;;Mind Domination;;-:1 Tag,Mind Blast,Mind Shock,Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Vengeance,Mind Blast Counterattack,Mind Domination,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can learn to stun, manipulate, even control enemies.
Class.desc: A mentalist who has achieved true mastery over Mind Control, gaining control over enemies at much greater range and without ending the turn. Mind Domination costs less, too.

Class.name: Thoughteater
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModAfterAttack;;Nauseate;;Use Once Tag,ModSkillPower;;Mind Shock;;*:1.25 Tag,ModSkillRange;;Mind Shock;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillAccuracy;;Mind Shock;;+:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Mind Shock,Feedback
Class.skillProgressionLate: ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Vengeance,Mind Blast Counterattack,Mind Domination,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can learn to stun, manipulate, even control enemies.
Class.desc: A mentalist who has achieved mastery over Nauseate and Mind Shock. They can keep moving and acting after using Nauseate; Mind Shock sports greater range, more damage, and base 100% accuracy for Stunned status.

Class.name: Photarch
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillPower;;Light Blast;;+:5 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Light Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Light Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Bomb,Mind Blast Counterattack,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can blind enemies and easily crack stone.
Class.desc: A photokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Light Blast, dealing 5 extra damage with each use and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Photokurios
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Light Blast;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Light Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Light Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Light Bomb,Mind Blast Counterattack,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can blind enemies and easily crack stone.
Class.desc: A photokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Light Blast, blinding enemies with greater range and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Caduceus
Class.skillProgressionInitial: RangeBonus;;Mind Shield;;+:1 Tag,RangeBonus;;Far Shield;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Mind Shield;;%:75 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Mega Shield;;%:75 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Big Shield;;%:75 Tag,Mind Shield,Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,Mega Shield,Long Shield/Far Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Big Shield,Orb Mastery,Solid State Shield,Static Shield,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who specializes in healing allies.
Class.desc: A psy healer who has achieved mastery over true psychokinetic shields, the caduceus learns to use most shields at a significant energy discount, with +1 range to Mind Shield and Far Shield.

Class.name: Hardshielder
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModAfterAttack;;Solid State Shield;;Unlimited Tag,Mind Shield,Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: ForSpecies:Human:Light Armor Mastery,Mega Shield,Long Shield/Far Shield
Class.skillProgressionLate: Big Shield,Orb Mastery,Solid State Shield,Static Shield,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who specializes in healing allies.
Class.desc: A psy healer who achieves mastery over solid-state shields, the hardshielder can manifest hardened psychokinetic barriers multiple times per turn.

Class.name: Pyrarch
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillPower;;Pyro Blast;;+:5 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Pyro Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Pyro Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Fire Gate/Overheat,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can set enemies on fire and easily detonate explosives.
Class.desc: A pyrokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Pyro Blast, dealing 5 extra damage with each use and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Pyrokurios
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Pyro Blast;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Pyro Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Pyro Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Fire Gate/Overheat,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can set enemies on fire and easily detonate explosives.
Class.desc: A pyrokineticist who has achieved true mastery over Pyro Blast, setting enemies ablaze with greater range and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Greater Red Spriggat
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Fire Breath;;-:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Fire Breath 2;;-:1 Tag,Claw,Fire Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Defrost
Class.skillProgressionLate: Fire Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Fire Breath 3
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can set multiple enemies on fire in a row.
Class.desc: A red spriggat specializing in breath attacks that can hit multiple enemies in a row and set them ablaze.

Class.name: Fireclaw
Class.skillProgressionInitial: BonusDmg;;Claw;;5;;Heat Tag,Claw,Fire Breath
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Wing Armor Mastery,Claw Mastery,Dive/Deep Breath,Kinetic Gust/Mind Shield/Defrost
Class.skillProgressionLate: Fire Breath 2,Claw Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Claws
Class.shortDesc: A flying fighter that can set multiple enemies on fire in a row.
Class.desc: A red spriggat specializing in melee. Sporting boosted Health and Dodge to better survive melee combat, the Fireclaw also imbues each claw strike with Heat damage to partially bypass regular armor.

Class.name: Skiarch
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillPower;;Shadow Blast;;+:5 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Shadow Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Shadow Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Vortex/Miasma,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can immobilize enemies and evaporate their physical defenses.
Class.desc: A skiakineticist who has achieved true mastery over Shadow Blast, dealing 5 extra damage with each use and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Skiakurios
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Shadow Blast;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Shadow Blast;;%:50 Tag,Mind Blast,Shadow Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Dark Vortex/Miasma,ForSpecies:Shadowling:Shadowport,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A psy user who can immobilize enemies and evaporate their physical defenses.
Class.desc: A skiakineticist who has achieved true mastery over Shadow Blast, softening and immobilizing enemies with greater range and at half the energy cost.

Class.name: Pikeman
Class.skillProgressionInitial: RangeBonus;;Spear;;+:1 Tag,Spear Mastery,Spear Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Shove
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Stick-and-Drag 2,Impale,Pierce Res. Proficiency/Slash Res. Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: A heavily armored front-line fighter that can attack from up to 3 spaces away.
Class.desc: Pikemen are stronger than normal spearmen. They can employ a low grip on their spears to extend their range an extra space at the cost of some damage, and can learn to attack after using Trade.

Class.name: Sentinel
Class.skillProgressionInitial: TargetValue;;1.5 Tag,ModSkillSFX;;Defensive Stance;;Defending|Power:25 Tag,Spear Mastery,Spear Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Medium Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Shove
Class.skillProgressionLate: Heavy Armor Mastery,Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance/Stick-and-Drag 2,Impale,Pierce Res. Proficiency/Slash Res. Proficiency,ModAfterAttack;;Trade;;Can Attack Tag
Class.shortDesc: A heavily armored front-line fighter that can attack from up to 2 spaces away.
Class.desc: The most durable of all non-golem classes, sentinels have trained to naturally draw enemy attention on the battlefield; additionally, they receive a 75% block chance from Defensive Stance instead of 50% and can learn to attack after using Trade.

Class.name: Poltergeist
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Juxtapose;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillRange;;Possess;;+:1 Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Possess;;Can Move Tag,Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Soul Suck,Transfer,Mind Shield/Mind Shock/Gravity Spike/Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Drain,Possess/Juxtapose,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.baseStatModifiers: Health,+:15/Energy,*:5.0,f:12/Strength,=:0/Psy,+:5/Perception,=:4/Speed,f:4/Appetite,=:0/Morale,=:0/Leadership,=:0/Pierce Res.,+:70/Slash Res.,+:50/Crush Res.,+:90/Mental Res.,-:50/Poison Res.,=:100/Recovery Rate,=:100/Health,+:6/Energy,+:6
Class.shortDesc: A being with incredible physical defense but high vulnerability to mental attacks. Cannot die.
Class.desc: Poltergeists are spirits that have grown more powerful at physical manipulation, sporting increased range on Juxtapose and Possess and the ability to move after possessing a target.

Class.name: Specter
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillRange;;Drain;;+:1 Tag,ModSkillCost;;Drain;;-:2 Tag,,ModSkillPower;;Drain;;+:5 Tag,Mind Blast
Class.skillProgressionEarly: Soul Suck,Transfer,Mind Shield/Mind Shock/Gravity Spike/Cryo Blast
Class.skillProgressionLate: Drain,Possess/Juxtapose,Mind Blast Counterattack,Psy Proficiency/Energy Proficiency
Class.baseStatModifiers: Health,+:15/Energy,*:5.0,f:12/Strength,=:0/Psy,+:5/Perception,=:4/Speed,f:4/Appetite,=:0/Morale,=:0/Leadership,=:0/Pierce Res.,+:70/Slash Res.,+:50/Crush Res.,+:90/Mental Res.,-:50/Poison Res.,=:100/Recovery Rate,=:100/Energy,+:20/Health,+:2/Psy,+:2
Class.shortDesc: A being with incredible physical defense but high vulnerability to mental attacks. Cannot die.
Class.desc: Specters are spirits with immense energy stores and a more effective Drain featuring +5 power, increased range, and decreased energy cost: perfect for debilitating psy users and damaging low-Energy opponents.

Class.name: Avalanche
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Fist,Shove,ModSkillCost;;Shove 2;;-:3 Tag,Toss,Module Mastery,ModAfterAttack;;Toss;;Use Once Tag,ModSkillCost;;Throw;;-:1 Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Engine Boost,Smash,Backthrow/Hurl,Shove 2,Fist Counterattack,Slash Res. Proficiency/Pierce Res. Proficiency/Crush Res. Proficiency
Class.growthModifiers: Strength,+:2/Pierce Res.,+:3/Slash Res.,+:2/Crush Res.,+:1/Cold Res.,=:0/Light Res.,=:0
Class.shortDesc: A slow, heavily armored front-line fighter that can hurl enemies great distances.
Class.desc: A slow-moving tank, the Avalanche is a stone golem that has grown proficient at grabbing and throwing opponents. It can use Throw for half the energy, and can Toss without ending the turn.

Class.name: Megalith
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Fist,Shove,ModSkillCost;;Shove 2;;-:3 Tag,Toss,Module Mastery,Hold
Class.skillProgressionLate: Engine Boost,Smash,Backthrow/Hurl,Shove 2,Fist Counterattack,Slash Res. Proficiency/Pierce Res. Proficiency/Crush Res. Proficiency
Class.growthModifiers: Strength,+:2/Pierce Res.,+:3/Slash Res.,+:2/Crush Res.,+:1/Cold Res.,=:0/Light Res.,=:0
Class.baseStatModifiers: Health,+:15,*:2.0/Energy,*:2.5,f:2/Strength,+:7/Perception,=:4/Speed,f:3/Dodge,-:10/Appetite,=:0/Morale,=:0/Leadership,=:0/Pierce Res.,*:6.0/Slash Res.,*:6.0/Crush Res.,*:6.0/Cold Res.,-:25/Light Res.,-:25/Poison Res.,=:100/Health,+:14/Energy,+:6/Strength,+:1/Pierce Res.,+:20/Slash Res.,+:20
Class.shortDesc: A slow, heavily armored front-line fighter that can hurl enemies great distances.
Class.desc: A slow-moving tank, the Megalith is a stone golem that has grown nearly impervious to piercing and slashing attacks. Megaliths can learn to use Hold, controlling enemy movement and trapping foes where they can later be thrown--or simply pulverized.

Class.name: Blade Dancer
Class.skillProgressionInitial: ModSkillCost;;Double Strike;;-:3 Tag,Sword Mastery,Sword Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Main Gauche Mastery,Shove,Disarming Strike
Class.skillProgressionLate: Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance,Rapier Mastery,Lunge/Cut,Shove 2/Pull 2,Double Strike,Energy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency
Class.shortDesc: An agile, dangerous front-line skirmisher with solid offenses and defenses.
Class.desc: An agile and deadly front-line skirmisher. With high dodge, reduced energy cost for the use of Double Strike, and a new Disarming Strike skill, the blade dancer focuses on avoiding enemy attacks and dealing a flurry of sword blows.

Class.name: Swordmaster
Class.skillProgressionInitial: Great Shield Mastery,Sword Mastery,Sword Counterattack,Light Armor Mastery,Small Shield Mastery,Main Gauche Mastery,Shove,ModAfterAttack;;Preemptive Stance;;Can Attack Tag,ModAfterAttack;;Defensive Stance;;Can Attack Tag
Class.skillProgressionLate: Preemptive Stance/Defiant Stance,Rapier Mastery,Lunge/Cut,Shove 2/Pull 2,Double Strike,Energy Proficiency/Strength Proficiency,Trade,Hold
Class.shortDesc: A balanced, versatile front-line skirmisher with solid offenses and defenses.
Class.desc: A versatile and reliable melee unit, the swordmaster is a swordsman with enhanced strength and defensive options. Swordmasters can use great shields to block enemy attacks even as they skirmish in melee, can learn Trade and Hold, and can follow up Defensive Stance and Preemptive Stance with other skills.
